amendment.description: To improve coordination of United States sanctions policy.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2238 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2238 proposed by Senator Inhofe for Senator Risch to Amendment SA 2301. (consideration: CR S4184; text: CR S4189) To improve coordination of United States sanctions policy.
